jinTra:
Jinns don't turn off the breaker. 
 
The Jinn gets faster the further away it is from a player when in line of sight. 
On small maps this will be hard to notice because you are always close to it.
jinAbi:
When you are in the same room or a range of 3m to the Jinn, it can drain your sanity by 20% **only if the breaker is on.** If this happens there will be EMF on the fuse box.

Can Hunt at 50% Sanity.
